item.title: By: Sam Vanga
item.dc:creator: Sam Vanga
item.description: Zahid, I've updated the query. Thanks for catching that.
item.content:encoded: Zahid, I’ve updated the query. Thanks for catching that.

item.title: By: Zahid Hanif
item.dc:creator: Zahid Hanif
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for the queries Sam.

When I run the second query on SQL Server 2008, I get an error. I had to change it to:
SELECT schema_name = SCHEMA_NAME(schema_id) ,
table_name = name
FROM sys.tables
WHERE OBJECTPROPERTY(OBJECT_ID, ‘TableHasPrimaryKey’) = 0
ORDER BY SCHEMA_NAME(schema_id) ,
name;
